translations: 国家自动支付系统（National Automated Pay we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  System）

sentences.sentence: True short sleepers don't need naps or coffee.
sentences.translation: 真正的短睡眠者不需要小睡或咖啡。

sentences.sentence: Though doctors may advise taking naps, employers do not allow it!
sentences.translation: 尽管医生可能会建议员工午睡，但雇主是不会允许的！

sentences.sentence: Also, keep naps to under an hour.
sentences.translation: 而且最好只小睡一小时。
